lines.value: for this purpose lucius staius murcus moved wi 60 ships an a legion o elite troops intae poseetion at cape matapan in the sooth o the peloponnese

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at the donations o alexandria in late 34 bc follaein antony's conquest o armenie cleopatra an caesarion wur crouned co rulers o egyp an cyprus alexander helios wis crouned ruler o armenie media an parthie cleopatra selene ii wis crouned ruler o cyrenaica an libie an ptolemy philadelphus wis crouned ruler o phoenicie sirie an cilicie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: her enemies in roum feared that cleopatra wis plannin a war o revenge that wis tae array aw the east against rome establish hersel as empress o the warld at rome cast juistice frae capitolium an inaugurate a new universal kinrick caesarion wis no anerlie elevatit haein coregency wi cleopatra but an aa proclaimed wi mony titles includin god son o god an keeng o keengs an wis depictit as horus
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter studyin historical texts an consultin wi toxicologists the historian concludit that the asp coud no hae caused a slow an pain free daith syne the asp egyptian cobra venom paralyses pairts o the body stairtin wi the een afore causin daith

lines.value: in his life of antony plutarch remarks that judgin bi the proofs which she haed haed afore this o the effect o her beauty upon caius caesar an gnaeus the son o pompey she haed hopes that she wad mair easily bring antony tae her feet
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: for caesar an pompey haed kent her when she was still a girl an inexperienced in affairs but she wis goin tae visit antony at the vera time when weemen hae the maist brilliant beauty
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: later in the wirk housomeivver plutarch indicates that her beauty as we are tauld was in itsel no aathegither incomparable nor such as tae strike those who saw her rather what ultimately made cleopatra attractive wur her wit chairm an sweetness in the tones o her voice cassius dio an aa spoke o cleopatra's allure for she wis a wumman o surpassin beauty an at that time when she wis in the prime o her youth she wis maist strikin she an aa possessed a maist chairmin voice an knawledge o hou tae make hersel agreeable tae ivery ane
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: being brilliant tae look upon and to listen to wi the pouer tae subjugate ivery ane even a love satit man awready past his prime she thought that it wad be in keepin wi her role tae meet caesar an she reposed in her beauty aw her claims tae the throne thir accoonts influenced later cultural depictions o cleopatra which teepically present her uisin her chairms tae influence the maist pouerful men in the wastren warld

lines.value: omar hassan ahmad al bashir born 1944 is the current preses o sudan an the heid o the naitional congress pairty
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he came tae pouer in 1989 when he as a brigadier in the sudanese airmy led a group o officers in a bloodless military coup that oostit the government o prime meenister sadiq al mahdi
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in october 2004 al bashir's government negotiatit an end tae the seicont sudanese civil war ane o the langest runnin an deadliest wars o the 20t century bi grantin limited autonomy tae soothren sudan dominatit bi the sudan people's liberation airmy spla
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: since then housomeivver there haes been a violent conflict in darfur that haes resultit in daith tolls atween 200000 an 400000
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin his presidency there hae been several violent struggles atween the janjaweed militia an rebel groups such as the sudanese liberation airmy sla an the justice an equality movement jem in the form o guerrilla warfare in the darfur region
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the civil war haes resultit in ower fowk being displaced an the diplomatic relations atween sudan an chad being at a crisis level
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: al bashir is a controversial figure baith in sudan an warldwide
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in julie 2008 the prosecutor o the international criminal court icc luis moreno ocampo accused al bashir o genocide crimes against humanity an war crimes in darfur
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the court issued an arrest warrant for al bashir on 4 mairch 2009 on coonts o war crimes an crimes against humanity but ruled that there wis insufficient evidence tae prosecute him for genocide
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: however on 12 julie 2010 efter a lengthy appeal bi the prosecution the court held that there wis indeed sufficient evidence for chairges o genocide tae be brought an issued a seicont warrant containin three separate coonts
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the new warrant as with the first will be delivered to the sudanese government which is unlikely to execute it
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: al bashir is the first sittin heid o state ever indictit bi the icc as well as the first to be chairged wi genocide

lines.value: encyclopaedia metallum the metal archives commonly kent as metal archives per the url or juist ma is a wabsteid which leets baunds frae various forms o hivy metal

lines.value: encyclopaedia metallum wis described bi matt sullivan o nashville scene as the internet's central database for aw that is tr00 in the metal warld terrorizer described the site as a fully exhaustive leet o pretty muckle ivery metal baund iver wi full discographies an active forum an an interlinkin members leet that shows the iver incestuous beauty o the metal scene
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nivertheless there are exceptions for baunds which faw unner disputit genres no acceptit bi the wabsteid

lines.value: encyclopaedia metallum attempts tae provide comprehensive information on each baund such as a discography logos pictures leerics line ups biography trivia an uiser submittit reviews

lines.value: the steid provides a seestem for submittin baunds tae the archives an aw

lines.value: as an incentive tae get fowk tae submit data the steid uises a point seestem in which registered uisers gain points an muive up ranks wi the amount an value o data an information they submit

lines.value: typically though the wabsteid affers mair points tae those who submit info aboot a baund itself
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the maist points are given tae uisers when actual baunds they submit tae the site are acceptit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the wabsteid is notably completely free o advertisements an as o 2012 is run completely independently

lines.value: this wis in pairt due tae an issue wi the company that hostit the steid

lines.value: the issue haes syne been correctit an the steid is runnin normally again

lines.value: encyclopaedia metallum anerlie accepts baunds which it deems metal but mony baunds that ance wur rejectit wur acceptit later on an vice versa
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the anerlie exceptions are side projects o members o metal baunds that hae a release on a label wi warldwide distribution baunds that are nae langer considered tae be metal but wur in the past an grindcore baunds that bear close similarities tae daith metal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: traditional hivy metal genres an eras such as the nwobhm hae stringent rulings uisers ar warned in the rules section tae consider baunds submittit unner these classifications as ambiguous in the sense that if a baund is submittit wi these terms as their genre the muisic will be extensively reviewed bi the moderators afore they decide whether or no tae accept the baund ontae the wabsteid
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this is acause in the past some submissions labeled wi those genres hae turned oot no tae be metal accordin tae the steid's guidelines
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: some baunds which are commonly referred tae as traditional hivy metal an nwobhm such as def leppard an stryper ar on the wabsteid due to anerlie ane or twa o the baunds albums meetin the wabsteid's specifications
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: additionally there are some nan metal baunds featured on the steid that are considered tae be pairt o the metal scene despite no being metal thairsels uisually daurk ambient an fowk baunds examples being mortiis elend nest :of the wand & the moon autumn tears stille volk etc
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: these baunds ar selectit bi the moderators in an admittedly arbitrary fashion an their submission bi normal uisers is discouragit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: genres that are sometimes associatit wi extreme metal such as grindcore an metalcore are absent as they ar seen tae hae mair in common wi punk than metal an aw
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: some grindcore baunds are acceptit if they are mair associatit wi daith metal e.g napalm death an pig destroyer
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mony uisers believe that metalcore baunds hae been completely banned frae the wabsteid syne a bulletin wis postit that simply statit please stop submittin core baunds
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: please housomeivver this is false mony metalcore baunds appear on the archives an mony mair hae been addiy syne the bulletin wis postit but the moderators hae become mair strict on wha metalcore baunds can be addit an generally wirk case bi case rather than sayin aw or zero metalcore baunds will be acceptit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: maist o the metalcore baunds that are allouit are the anes hivily influenced bi melodic daith metal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: glam metal is rejectit if the websteid awners consider the baund mair hard rock than metal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: industrial metal is anerlie allouit if the site's staff consider it mair metal relatit than industrial for example the baund rammstein is no alloued while industrial rock pioneers ministry wur finally acceptit in mairch 2006 based on the newer ootput o this baund which haes incorporatit a lot o thrash metal influence
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: anither recent acceptit baund ance blocked bi the administration is the industrial group pitchshifter based on their first three metal influencit albums
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: encyclopaedia metallum can anerlie accept grunge an alternative metal baunds if awners consider them metal the melvins soundgarden helmet faith no more an alice in chains hae aw been acceptit while nirvana pearl jam tool an chevelle are no allouit on the steid
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: baunds that are associatit wi the nu metal label are completely forbidden an hae been syne the wabsteid stairtit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: housomeivver certain baunds which are commonly regardit as nu metal wur acceptit an aw if the moderators considered certain albums metal enough
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this pairticular loophole wis exploitit tae comedic effect on aprile fools day 2009 bi the steid's staff when popular nu metal baund korn wis briefly addit tae the database whareupon a series o stagit arguments atween moderators appeared throughoot the day on the steid's forum
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the steid runners hae standards which exclude some baunds that are considered bi some sites such as allmusic or juist mention led zeppelin as hard rock
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in fact mony o what are aften viewed as the oreeginal 1970s hivy metal baunds are missin frae the wabsteid such as blue oyster cult uriah heep vanilla fudge cactus an dust
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a sma amoont o uisers hae questioned these exclusions on the wabsteid's message buird in the past
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the ither hand ither 1970s baunds such as black sabbath deep purple scorpions sir lord baltimore rush rainbow thin lizzy budgie an pentagram ar acceptit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tunisie offeecially the tunisian republic الجمهورية التونسية‎ al jumhuriyya at tunisiyya is the northrenmaist kintra in africae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is an arab kintra an is bordered bi algerie tae the wast libie tae the sootheast an the mediterranean sea tae the north an east
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: its aurie is amaist 165000 km² wi an estimatit population o juist ower 10.3 million
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: its name is derived frae the caipital tunis locatit in the north east
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the wird tunisie is derived frae tunis a ceety an caipital o modren day tunisie

lines.value: the present form o the name wi its latinate suffix ia evolved frae french tunisie

lines.value: this name wis introduced bi french geographers an historians as pairt o thair efforts tae gie names tae thair new occupied territories an protectorates
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the french derivative tunisie wis adoptit in some european leids wi slicht modifications introducin a distinctive name tae designate the kintra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ither leids remained untouched sic as the spainyie tunez
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in this case the same name is uised for baith kintra an ceety as in arabic تونس an ae bi context can ane tell the difference

lines.value: the name tunis can be attributit tae different oreegins
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it can be associatit wi the phoenician goddess tanith aka tunit auncient ceety o tynes or tae the berber ruit ens which means tae lie doun

lines.value: problems arose when the caur came tae be driven as it wis a poor handler haed a top speed o barely 80 mph an wis an overall disappointment tae its early viewers ane o whom ken richardson o brm described it as a daith trap the caur which never went intae production wis wi'drawn an the designs taken back tae the drawin board an a year later the new improved triumph tr2 wis unveiled

lines.value: cantonese is a leid spoken in an aroond the ceety o canton now guangzhou in soothren cheenae bi the majority population o hong kong an macau an as a lingua franca o guangdong province eastren guangxi province an some neighborin auries
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the pula is the currency o botswana
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haes the iso 4217 code bwp an is subdividit intae 100 thebe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: pula literally means rain in setswana acause rain is vera scarce in botswana hame tae muckle o the kalahari desert an therefore valuable
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: pula an aa means blessing as rain is considered a blessing
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thebe means shield
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the pula wis introduced in 1976 replacin the sooth african rand at par
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: despite a 12% devaluation in mey 2005 the pula remains ane o the strangest currencies in africae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1976 coins wur introduced in denominations o 1 5 10 25 an 50 thebe an 1 pula
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the 1 thebe wis struck in aluminium wi the 5 thebe in bronze an the ithers in cupro nickel
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: these coins were round except for the scalloped 1 pula
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bronze dodecagonal 2 thebe coins wur introduced in 1981 but discontinued efter 1985
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1991 bronze platit steel replaced bronze in the 5 thebe nickel platit steel replaced cupro nickel in the 10 25 an 50 thebe an the 1 pula chynged tae a smawer nickel brass equilateral curve seiven sidit coin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a similarly shapit nickel brass 2 pula wis introduced in 1994
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1998 follaeinthe athdrawal o the 1 an 2 thebe smawer 5 10 25 an 50 thebe coins wur introduced wi the 5 an 25 thebe coins being seiven sidit an the 10 an 50 thebe coins remainin roond
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a bimetallic 5 pula wis introduced in 2000 composed o a cupronickel center in a brass ring

lines.value: the coat o airms o trinidad an tobago wis designed bi a committee formed in 1962 tae select the seembols that wad be representative o the fowk o trinidad an tobago

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the palm tree at the tap o the coat o airms wis taken frae tobago's coat o airms afore it wis joined in poleetical union wi trinidad

lines.value: the wreath represents the cron o the monarchy o the unitit kinrick trinidad an tobago's colonizers at the time o unthirldom

lines.value: the shield haes the same colours black red an white o the naition's banner an carry the same meanin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the gowd ships represent the santa maria la nina an la pinta the three ships christopher columbus uised on his journey tae the new warld the twa birds on the shield are hummingbirds
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: trinidad is whiles referred tae as the land o the hummingbird acause mair nor saxteen different species o hummingbird hae been recordit on the island
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: land o the hummingbird is an aa believed tae hae been the native american name for trinidad
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the twa lairger birds are the scarlet ibis left an the cocrico richt the naitional birds o trinidad an tobago
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: belaw the scarlet ibis are three hills representin the trinity hills in soothren trinidad which it is believed convinced columbus tae name the island efter the holy trinity

lines.value: an atom is the smawest consteetuent unit o ordinary matter that haes the properties o a chemical element
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ivery solit liquid gas an plasma is componed o neutral or ionised atoms

lines.value: atoms are very smaw teepical sizes are aroond 100 picometres a ten billiont o a metre in the short scale
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: atoms are smaw eneuch that attemptin tae predict thair behaviour uisin clessical pheesics as if thay war billiard baws for ensaumple gies noticeably incorrect predictions due tae quantum effects
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: throu the development o pheesics atomic models hae incorporatit quantum principles tae better expleen an predict the behaviour
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ivery atom is componed o a nucleus an ane or mair electrons boond tae the nucleus
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: protons an neutrons are cried nucleons

lines.value: mair nor 99.94% o an atom's mass is in the nucleus

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: if the nummer o protons an electrons are equal that atom is electrically neutral

lines.value: if an atom haes mair or fewer electrons nor protons then it haes an oweraw negative or positive charge respectively an it is cried an ion

lines.value: the electrons o an atom are attractit tae the protons in an atomic nucleus bi this electromagnetic force
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the protons an neutrons in the nucleus are attractit tae each ither bi a different force the nuclear force which is uisually stranger than the electromagnetic force repellin the positively charged protons frae ane anither
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: unner certaint circumstances the repellin electromagnetic force acomes stranger nor the nuclear force an nucleons can be ejectit frae the nucleus leavin behind a different element nuclear decay resultin in nuclear transmutation

lines.value: atoms can attach tae ane or mair ither atoms bi chemical bonds tae form chemical compoonds sic as molecules

lines.value: the abeelity o atoms tae associate an dissociate is responsible for maist o the pheesical chynges observed in naitur an is the subject o the discipline o chemistry
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the idea that matter is made up o discrete units is a very auld idea appearin in mony auncient culturs sic as greece an indie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the wird atom wis creautit bi auncient greek filosofers
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: houiver thir ideas war foondit in filosofical an theological raisonin raither nor evidence an experimentation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a result thair views on whit atoms leuk lik an hou thay behave war incorrect
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the early 1800s john dalton uised the concept o atoms tae expleen why elements ayeweys react in ratios o smaw hale nummers the law o multiple proportions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: dalton an aa believed atomic theory coud expleen why watter absorbs different gases in different proportions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: for ensaumple he foond that watter absorbs carbon dioxide faur better nor it absorbs nitrogen
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: dalton hypothesized this wis due tae the differences atween the masses an configurations o the gases respective pairticles an carbon dioxide molecules co 2 ) are hivier an lairger nor nitrogen molecules n 2 ).
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1827 botanist robert brown uised a microscope tae leuk at dist grains fleetin in watter an discovered that thay muived aboot erratically a phenomenon that acame kent as brownian motion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this wis thocht tae be caused bi watter molecules knockin the grains aboot
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1905 albert einstein pruived the reality o thir molecules an thair motions bi producin the first stateestical pheesics analysis o brownian motion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: french pheesicist jean perrin uised einstein's wark tae experimentally determine the mass an dimensions o atoms thareby conclusively verifeein dalton's atomic theory
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the pheesicist j j thomson meisurt the mass o cathode rays shawin thay war made o pairticles but war aroond 1800 times lichter nor the lichtest atom hydrogen
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tharefore thay war nae atoms but a new pairticle the first subatomic pairticle tae be discovered that he oreeginally cried corpuscle but wis later named electron efter pairticles postulatit bi george johnstone stoney in 1874
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he an aa shawed thay war identical tae pairticles gien off bi photoelectric an radioactive materials
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis quickly recognised that thay are the pairticles that cairy electric currents in metal weirs an cairy the negative electric chairge within atoms
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thomson wis gien the 1906 nobel prize in pheesics for this wark
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sicweys he owerturned the belief that atoms are the indivrrsible ultimate pairticles o matter
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thomson an aa incorrectly postulatit that the law mass negatively chairged electrons wra distributed ootthrou the atom in a uniform sea o positive chairge
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1909 hans geiger an ernest marsden unner the direction o ernest rutherford bombardit a metal foil wi alpha pairticles tae observe hou thay scaitert
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thay expectit aw the alpha pairticles tae pass straicht throu wi little deflection acause thomson's model said that the chairges in the atom are sae diffuise that thair electric fields coud nae affect the alpha pairticles muckle
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: houiver geiger an marsden spottit alpha pairticles bein deflectit bi angles greater nor 90° that wis supposed tae be impossible accordin tae thomson's model
lines.name: Scots

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the term isotope wis coined bi margaret todd as a suitable name for different atoms that alang tae the same element

lines.value: jj thomson creautit a technique for separatin atom teeps throu his wark on ionised gases that subsequently led tae the discovery o stable isotopes

lines.value: in 1913 the pheesicist niels bohr proponed a model in that the electrons o an atom war assumed tae orbit the nucleus but coud anerly dae sae in a finite set o orbits an coud jimp atween thir orbits anerly in discrete cheenges o energy correspondin tae absorption or radiation o a photon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this quantisation wis uised tae expleen why the electrons orbits are stable gien that normally chairges in acceleration includin circular motion lose kinetic energy that is emittit as electromagnetic radiation see synchrotron radiation an why elements absorb an emit electromagnetic radiation in discrete spectra

lines.value: later in the same year henry moseley providit addeetional experimental evidence in favour o niels bohr's theory

lines.value: in 1924 louis de broglie proponed that aw pairticles behave tae an extent lik swaws
lines.name: Scots

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ukraine ( ), whiles cried the ukraine is a sovereign state in eastren europe mairchit bi roushie tae the east an northeast belaroushie tae the northwast poland hungary an slovakie tae the wast romanie an moldovae tae the soothwast an the black sea an sea o azov tae the sooth an sootheast respectively
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ukraine is currently in a territorial dispute wi roushie ower the crimean peninsula that roushie annexed in 2014 but that ukraine an maist o the internaitional commonty recognise as ukrainian
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: includin crimea ukraine haes an aurie o makkin it the lairgest kintra entirely within europe an the 46t lairgest kintra in the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: excludin crimea ukraine haes a population o aboot 42.5 million makkin it the 32nt maist populous kintra in the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the territory o modren ukraine haes been inhabitit syne 32000 bc in the middle ages the aurie wis a key centre o east slavic cultur wi the pouerfu state o kievan rus formin the basis o ukrainian identity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein its fragmentation in the 13t century the territory wis contestit ruled an dividit bi a variety o pouers includin lithuanie poland the ottoman empire austrick hungary an roushie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a cossack republic emerged an prospered in the 17t an 18t centuries but its territory wis eventually split atween poland an the roushie empire an later merged fully intae roushie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the 20t century three periods o unthirldom occurred
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the first o thir periods occurred briefly in an immediately efter the german occupation near the end o warld war i an the seicont occurred an aa briefly an an aa in german occupation in warld war ii
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: houiver baith o thir first twa earlier periods wad eventually see ukraine's territories consolidatit back intae a soviet republic within the ussr
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the third period o unthirldom begoud in 1991 whan ukraine gained its unthirldom frae the soviet union in the eftermath o its dissolution at the end o the cauld war
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ukraine haes maintained its unthirldom as a sovereign state iver syne
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: afore its unthirldom ukraine wis teepically referred tae as the ukraine but soorces syne then hae muived tae drap the frae the name o ukraine in aw uises
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein its unthirldom ukraine declared itsel a neutral state
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nanetheless it formed a leemitit militar pairtnership wi the roushie federation an ither cis kintras an a pairtnership wi nato in 1994
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the 2000s the govrenment begoud leanin taewart nato an a deeper cooperation wi the alliance wis set bi the nato ukraine action plan signed in 2002
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis later agreed that the quiasten o jynin nato shoud be answered bi a naitional referendum at some pynt in the futur
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: umwhile preses viktor yanukovych conseedert the current level o co operation atween ukraine an nato sufficient an wis against ukraine jynin nato
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 2013 efter the govrenment o preses yanukovych ha decidit tae suspend the ukraine european union association greement an seek closer economic ties wi roushie a several months lang wave o demonstrations an protests kent as the euromaidan begoud that later escalatit intae the 2014 ukrainian revolution that led tae the owerthraw o preses yanukovych an his cabinet an the establishment o a new govrenment
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thir events formed the backgrund for the annexation o crimea bi roushie in mairch 2014 an the war in donbass in apryle 2014
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on 1 januar 2016 ukraine applee'd the economic pairt o the deep an comprehensive free tred aurie wi the european union
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ukraine haes lang been a global breidbasket acause o its extensive growthie fermlands an is ane o the warld's lairgest grain exporters
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the diversified economy o ukraine includes a lairge hivy industry sector pairteecularly in aerospace an industrial equipment
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ukraine is a unitar republic unner a semi presidential seestem wi separate pouers legislative executive an judicial brainches
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: its caipital an lairgest ceety is kiev

lines.value: takkin intae accoont reserves an paramilitar personnel ukraine mainteens the seicont lairgest military in europe efter that o roushie

lines.value: the kintra is hame tae 42.5 million fowk excludin crimea 77.8 percent o that are ukrainians bi ethnicity follaed bi a sizeable minority o roushies 17.3 percent as weel as georgies romanies/moldovans belaroushies crimean tatars bulgaries an hungarians
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ukrainian is the offeecial leid an its alphabet is cyrillic

lines.value: the wii ( ) is a hame video gemme console released bi nintendo on 19 november 2006
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a seivent generation console the wii competit wi microsoft's xbox 360 an sony's playstation 3
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nintendo states that its console targets a broader demographic than that o the twa ithers
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: , the wii leads its generation ower playstation 3 an xbox 360 in warldwide sales wi mair nor 101 million units sauld in dizember 2009 the console breuk the sales record for a single month in the unitit states
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the beatles wis an inglis baund frae liverpuil that's members wis john lennon paul mccartney george harrison an ringo starr
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they are ane o the maist commercially successfu an weel respectit baunds in the history o popular muisic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the unitit kinrick the beatles released mair than fowerty different singles albums an eps that won til nummer ane
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this commercial success wis repeatit in monny ither kintras their record company emi estimatit that by 1985 they had selt ower ane billyon discs an tapes warldwide
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the beatles is the best sellin muisical act o aw time in the unitit states gaun by the recordin industry association o americae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 2004 rolling stone magazine rankit the beatles nummer ane in its list o the 100 greatest airtists o aw time
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: gaun by the selsame magazine their innovative muisic an cultural impact helpit define the 1960s an their influence on pop cultur is aye evident the day
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the beatles led the mid 1960s muisical british invasion in the the unitit states
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho their ineetial muisical style wis ruitit in 1950s rock an rowe an hame grown skiffle the group explored genres reenging frae tin pan alley tae psychadelic rock
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: their claes styles an statements made thaim trend setters while their growin social awaurness shaws their influence extendit in tae the social an cultural revolutions o the 1960s
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in mairch 1957 while gaun tae quarry bank grammar school in liverpool john lennon formed a skiffle group cawed the quarrymen
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: lennon an the quarrymen met guitarist paul mccartney at the woolton garden fete hauden at saunt peters kirk on the 6t juily 1957 an eikit him tae the group a few days efter
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on 6t februar 1958 the young guitarist george harrison wis invitit tae watch the group that played unnerr sindry different names perform at wilson haw garstoun liverpuil
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mccartney haed become acquent wi harrison on the mornin schuil bus hurl tae the liverpuil institute as they baith dwalt in speak
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at mccartneys insistance harrison jyned the quarrymen as lead guitarist efter a rehersal in mairch 1958 owercomin lennon's ineetial reluctance acause o harrison's young age
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: new members conteenad tae jyne an lea the line up durin that period an in januar 1960 lennon's airt schuil freend stuart sutcliffe jyned on bass
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: lennon an mccartney baith played rythm guitar an the group haed a heich turnower o drummers
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the quarrymen gaed throu a progression o names - "johnny and the moondogs long john and the beatles the silver beatles derived frae larry parness suggeestion o long john and the silver beetles - afore settlin o the beatles in august 1960
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare's mony theories as tae the oreegin o the name an its unuisual spellin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is for ordinar creedit tae lennon wha said that the name wis a combination wird play on the insect clocks inglis beetles as a referece tae buddy holly's baund the crickets an the wird beat
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cynthia lennon suggeestit that lennon cleckit the name for the beatles at a brainstorming session ower a beer soakit teeple in the renshaw haw baur lennon wha wis weel kent for giein multiple versions o the same story jokit in a 1961 mersey beat magazine airticle that it cam in a veesion - a man kythed on a bleizin pie an said tae them frae this day on ye're the beatles
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: east ayrshire spelt eist ayrshire an aest ayrshire anaw (), is ane o the 32 cooncil auries o scotland

lines.value: alang wi sooth ayrshire an the mainland bits o north ayrshire it furm'd the umwhyl coontie o ayrshire

lines.value: polynesie's a name uised in geography for the region made up o samoa tonga tuvalu new zealand an a puckle ither islands in the surroondin area

lines.value: cognates in lingueestics is wirds that haes a common oreegin

lines.value: turkis is a leid that is spak in turkey cyprus bulgarie greece an ither kintras that wis pairt o the umwhile ottoman empire
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mony fowk haes quat thae pairts in recent years for tae bide ithergates
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: forby thon thare's several million speakers o turkis in ither pairts o europe an a puckle in australie an north americae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: turkis is a member o the altaic faimily o leids
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is ane o the few human leids wi a featur cried vouel hermony that guides whaur the vouel soonds will be athin a wird
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: vouels that's unalike canna be ower naur thegither
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ither lieds that haes thon is mongolian an manchu that's baith altaic leids forby
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: turkis wirds for ordinar maks a phrase in sic a wey subject object verb sov
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: gin a body wis tae mak an sov scots phrase it wad gang siclike the dug the hen ett turkis uised tae be scrieved wi the arabic alphabet frae aboot 900 ad tae 1928
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the ottoman empire turkis leid haed a fouthie leeteratur an mony beuks war scrieved in it
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: houaniver mustafa kemal ataturk chynged it tae the latin alphabet acause he wantit his kintra tae be integrated wi waster kintras tae tak advantage o technological betterments o thaim
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: european kintras war developit gey fest efter the renaissance an thay left the ottoman empire ahint
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a eftercome maist turks nou canna screed aff text scrieve afore the chynge
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: turkce this leid is maist nearly relatit tae ither turkic leids includin uzbek turkmen an kazakh
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare is anither theory that turkis is pairt o a muckler altaic leid faimily whit includes japanese mongolie an korean an aw

lines.value: the scots language centre slc is a curn that wirks tae promote the uiss o scots an gie information an wittins aboot whit's gaun on in the scots leid warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the slc wis stairtit in 1994 unner the name o the scots language resource centre
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it cam about frae an ineetiative begoud by the scots leid associe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they got support frae the perth cooncil an a space wis fund for thaim tae hae an office in the ak bell librar in perth that wis bein biggit at thon time the office is aye in the same steid the day
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the first director o the centre wis stuart mchardy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the buird convenor wis chairlie jones frae the varsity o edinburgh
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the slc's wark is tae gaither in an pit oot information aboot scots an maist o this wark is duin on their wabsite that haes wittins airticles spoken wird recordins blogs an ithir featurs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: maist o the site is in baith scots an inglis tho pairts o it is juist in ane o thir leids sic as the blogs that's juist in scots
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ane o the featurs is the scots wurd o the week that's taen frae the herald newspaper an can be heard in a wee soondclip file read by sic fowk as actress joyce makar rab wilson an alasdair allan msp
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mair oot ower the slc rins an annual programme o its ain online events an featurs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: fowk that's wantin wittins o whit's gaun on in the warld o the scots leid can sign up tae a mailin list frae the centre on the wabsite that sends oot emails ilka month tellin fowk whit's comin in the near an furder aff future sic as the sla's collogue scrievin compeetitions talks etc
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: syne the slc gies a space whaur fowk can gie wittins an find oot whit's gaun on it haes richt freendly relationships wi ither groups an single bodies that's aye dargin tae gie the leid mair o a staundin in ilka day life
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mair speceefically the slc wirks wi a reenge o pairtners amang them can be coontit the national library of scotland the scottish poetry library the herald an the lorimer trust
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: laird is a teetle wi monie meanins
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it can denote a prince or a feudal superior specially a feudal tenant that hauds direct fae the keeng i.e a baron
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the teetle the day is for ordinar uised thegither wi the peerage o the unitit kinrick or its fore gaun kintras altho some uisers o the teetle disna thaimsels haud peerages an uise it bi courtesy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the teetle micht be uised an aw thegither wi ithers for tae denote a superior beirer o an itherwice generic teetle in sic combinations as laird mayor or laird chief juistice
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the teetle is by men an weemen the laird o mann an female laird mayors is ensaumples o weemen that's styled laird
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in releegious contexts laird can refer tae sindry unalike gods or deities an aw
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the earliest uisses o laird in the scots leid in a releegious context wis bi bible translators
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this reflectit the jewish practice o substitutin the spaken ebreu word adonai that means my laird for yhwh whan read oot lood
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the thrapple or hause(-pipe is the pairt o the gastrointestinal seestem atween the mooth an the painch

lines.value: the thrapple is lined wi muscle

lines.value: this muscle pushes the baw o fuid doun intae the painch

lines.value: the thrapple can contract or hove for tae allou for the passage o fuid

lines.value: jerez de la frontera is a municipality in the province o cadiz in the autonomous community o andalusie in soothwastren spain situatit midway atween the sea an the mountains
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as o 2008 the ceety the lairgest ceety in the province haed 205364 inhabitants it is the fift lairgest in andalusie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it haes become the transportation an communications hub o the province surpassin even cadiz the provincial caipital in economic activity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: jerez de la frontera is an aw in terms o land aurie the lairgest municipality in the province an its sprawlin ootlyin auries are a fertile zone for agricultur
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: there are an aw mony cattle ranches an horse breedin operations as well as a warld renouned wine industry
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: british steel scots breetish steel wis a major breetish steel producer
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it originated as a nationalised industry the british steel corporation bsc formed in 1967
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this wis converted tae a leemitit company british steel plc an privatised in 1988
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis ance a constituent o the ftse 100 index but follaein mergers the business is nou owned bi corus a tata steel company
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bsc wis formed frae the assets o umwhile private companies which haed been nationalised largely unner the labour party govrenment o harold wilson 1964-1970
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wilson's wis the seicont attempt at nationalisation clement attlee's iron and steel corporation of great britain haein been largely privatised bi the conservative governments o the 1950s
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: anly ane steel company richard thomas and baldwins remained in public ainership throughout

lines.value: coonty leitrim () is ane o the twenty sax coonties o the republic o ireland an ane o the thirty twa coonties o ireland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is locatit in the province o connacht
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis named efter the toun o leitrim ().
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the population o the coonty is 28950 accordin tae the 2006 census
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is the smawest o connacht's 5 coonties in both size an population
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: coonty roscommon () is ane o the twenty sax coonties o the republic o ireland an also ane o the thirty twa coonties o ireland locatit athin the province o connacht
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis namit efter the toun o roscommon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the population o the coonty is 58768 accordin tae the 2006 census
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: roscommon is the 11t lairgest o ireland's 32 coonties in area the fift least populous coonty in ireland an haes the seicont least population densitie efter leitrim
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it's the third lairgest o connacht's 5 coonties in size and fowert lairgest in terms o population
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the coonty borders every other connacht coonty including galway mayo sligo an leitrim
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 2008 it wis revealed that statistically roscommon haes the longest life expectancy o any coonty on the island o ireland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: lough key in north roscommon is noted for haein thirty twa islands
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this is coincidentally the number o coonties on the island o ireland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: napalm death are a grindcore baund formit in meriden ingland in 1981
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: while nane o its oreeginal members remain in the group the lineup o vocalist mark barney greenway bassist shane embury guitarist mitch harris an drummer danny herrera haes remained consistent for maist o the baund's career
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: napalm death are creditit wi definin the grindcore genre bi incorporatin elements o hardcore punk an daith metal short sangs fast tempos deep guttural vocals an sociopoleetical leerics
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund's debut album scum released in 1987 bi earache records pruivit substantially influential throughoot the global metal commonty
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: napalm death wur formit in the veelage o meriden near birmingham ingland in august 1982 bi nic bullen an miles ratledge while the duo wur still in their early teenage years
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the duo haed been playin in amateur baunds syne 1980 as an extension o their fanzine writin an went through a number o names includin civil defence the mess evasion an undead hatred afore chuisin napalm death in mid 1981
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund wur initially inspired bi the early wave o punk baunds particularly the anarcho punk movement a sub genre o punk muisic focused on anarchist politics an groups athin that genre such as crass
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the first stable line up o the group consistit o nicholas bullen on vocals an bass simon oppenheimer on guitar an miles ratledge on drums an lastit frae december 1981 tae januar 1982
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: graham robertson joined on bass in januar 1982
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: simon oppenheimer left the group in august 1982 an wis replaced bi darryl fedeski who left the group in october 1982 at this point graham robertson began tae play guitar an finbarr quinn ex-curfew joined on bass an backin vocals
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the group played concerts throughoot 1982 playin their first concert on 25 julie 1982 at atherstone miners club an 1983 sharin billin wi anarcho punk groups such as amebix the apostles an antisect an made 4 demo recordins in 1982 an 1983 ane o which contributit their first released recordin tae the bullshit detector volume 3 compilation released bi crass records in 1984
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund entered a period o hiatus frae the end o 1983 onwards playin anerlie ane concert in 1984 a benefit for strikin mine wirkers wi additional vocalist marian williams ex-relevant pos an sister o the drummer o the group human cabbages frae coventry
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin this period bullen met justin broadrick a guitarist frae birmingham wi whom he shared an interest in the muisic o baunds such as killing joke throbbing gristle crass amebix swans an the developin pouer electronics scene
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bullen joined broadrick's final project for a period in 1983
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in julie 1985 napalm death briefly reformit in order tae appear at a concert at the mermaid in birmingham which wis an aa notable as the last concert bi final
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the group consistit o a 4-piece line up o miles ratledge drums bullen vocals bass an guitar graham robertson guitar an bass an damien errington guitar
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter this concert ratledge an bullen asked broadrick tae join napalm death as guitarist wi bullen as vocalist an bass player
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund began tae develop a muisical style which blendit elements o post punk pairticularly killing joke an amebix hivy punk in the vein o discharge an thrash metal wi pairticular reference tae possessed an celtic frost
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the group played their first concert as a trio on 31 august 1985 playin 2 concerts on the same day telford wi chumbawamba an blyth power an birmingham wi we've got a fuzzbox and we're gonna use it an began tae play regularly in the birmingham aurie pairticularly at the mermaid public hoose in the sparkhill aurie o birmingham wi a wide range o musickers includin icons of filth concrete sox the varukers decadence within an the groundhogs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in september 1985 peter shaw ex-autism joined on bass
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the 4-piece line up recordit hatred surge the band's 5t demo recordin on 23 october 1985 which the baund made available at their concerts an bi mail
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein the recordin o the demo bullen an broadrick wished tae extend their exploration o a mair extreme muisical style which creatit a split in the group wi ratledge as a result the group splintered an mick harris a local fan wis asked tae join as drummer in december 1985
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the trio bullen on vocals an bass broadrick on guitar an harris on drums made their first performance on 15 december 1985 an went on tae play mony concerts in 1986 predominantly in the birmingham area wi muisickers such as amebix antisect chaos uk varukers disorder an dirge
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the group recordit a 6t demo from enslavement to obliteration on 15 mairch 1986 which the group made available at their concerts an through mail afore makin a 7t recordin later that year scum which wis proveesionally intendit tae form pairt o a split lp wi the inglis hardcore baund atavistic on manic ears records
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this recordin later became the first side o the baund's debut album scum in 1987
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund then faced a number o line up chynges
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bullen wis becomin frustratit wi the muisical direction o the group an began tae lose interest as a whole as a result jim whiteley wis asked tae join as bass player
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund played a number o concerts as a fower piece afore justin broadrick left the group tae play the drums for local baund head of david
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the group attemptit tae fynd a new guitarist bi askin shane embury ex-unseen terror an a fan o the group tae join an givin a trial period tae frank healy ex-annihilator later o cerebral fix an sacrilege
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter broadrick's depairtur bullen's dissatisfaction wi the muisical direction o the group led him tae leave the group in december 1986 in order tae focus on his studies in inglis leeteratur an philosophy at university
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wi the depairtur o broadrick an bullen the baund haed tae leuk for new members
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: guitarist bill steer played in a baund based in liverpool cried carcass an given the affinity atween the baunds he joined napalm death while still playin an active role in carcass
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund asked a friend lee dorrian tae join as vocalist due tae his guid relationship wi the baund he haed organised a number o concerts for the baund even though he haed niver been in a baund afore
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this line up recordit the b side o the scum lp at rich bitch studios in mey 1987 an the album wis released through earache records
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund promptly lost anither member juist afore they unnerteuk a short tour efter the release o scum
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: jim whiteley left the group tae join ripcord an shane embury umwhile drummer o unseen terror joined on bass
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund then appeared on twa compilation records north atlantic noise attack an the pathological compilation recordit twa peel sessions an a split 7 wi the japanese baund sob they an aw returned tae rich bitch studio ance mair an recordit their seicont album from enslavement to obliteration.a follae up release tae enslavement came in the form o the sax sang 12 ep mentally murdered which wis tae be the last recordin wi the harris/steer/dorian/embury line up
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this ep wis recordit at the slaughterhouse studios an teuk on a slichtly different soond blendin grindcore wi daith metal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein the release napalm death wur featured on naitional televeesion in the unitit kinrick in a hivy metal special bi arena bbc 2).the baund continued tae tour but as suin as they came back hame frae japan in julie 1989 steer an dorrian left the baund steer decidit tae focus full time on carcass while dorrian formit the doom metal group cathedral
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the group recruitit jesse pintado ex-terrorizer on guitar an mark barney greenway ex-benediction as vocalist
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this line up teuk pairt in the grindcrusher tour organised bi earache records an featurin fellae label mates carcass bolt thrower an morbid angel
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the group recruitit mitch harris ex-righteous pigs as their seicont guitarist efter the tour
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in florida they stairtit wirkin on their next album harmony corruption
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: while writin harmony corruption they chynged their style a little frae grindcore tae a mix o blast beats an some slower mair rhythmic pairts
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in addition daith metal wis a major influence on harmony corruption mair so than their previous records
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter releasin the new record they went on tourin aroond the warld an frae the material filmed at those concerts they released a hame video live corruption
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis directit bi notit metal director steve payne
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund caught considerable flack frae langtime fans in respect tae the daith metal soond an production o harmony corruption
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: smartin frae the accusations o sellin oot bi the breetish unnergrund elites napalm entered eddie van dale's violent noise experience club in mairch o 91 tae record sax new tracks
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: these new sangs the mass appeal madness 12 lp haed a muckle mair raw grind quality tae them fyndin instant favour wi fans
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this recordin alang wi the mentally murdered 12 the split 7 wi sob an live tracks frae live corruption foond a hame on the death by manipulation cd.drummer mick harris the anerlie remainin member o the line up that haed played on the baund's first album scum eventually left napalm death acause o conflicts regardin their muisical style
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: danny herrera a close friend tae jesse pintado wis brought in tae replace mick
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the addition o herrera wad be the last major line up chynge o the baund save for jesse pintado's futur absence which haes yet tae be filled an vocalist phil vane niver recordit wi the baund
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: napalm death released a new record utopia banished
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nou wirkin wi producer colin richardson
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this release wis a kynd o return tae the ruits grindcore
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter recordin the world keeps turning ep the baund toured europe wi dismember an obituary on the campaign for musical destruction tour
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they then toured the us wi sepultura sacred reich an sick of it all
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the proceeds o napalm death's 1993 ep nazi punks fuck off wur donatit tae anti fascist organisations
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund remixed the track mind of a razor bi lunnon based hip hop crew gunshot
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the remixed version o the track appeared on the ep o the same name in 1992
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thereefter they went tae the studio an recordit fear emptiness despair

lines.value: although it wis still as hivy an aggressive as iver the new record teuk a different direction an soondit mair experimental they addit mair rhythmic riffs an industrial like structur an then addit grindcore blast beats

lines.value: clan douglas an aa referred tae as the hoose o douglas is an auncient scots clan frae the scots lawlands takin its name frae douglas sooth lanrikshire an thence spreadin throu the scots borderland angus lothian an ayont
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the clan daes no currently hae a chief therefore it is considered an airmigerous clan
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the douglases wur ance the maist pouerful faimily in scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the pouerful douglas chiefs held the titles o the earl o douglas black douglas earl o angus red douglas an at ane pynt the earl o morton
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mony douglases mairit intae scots an ither european royal an noble hooses therebi ensurin douglas pouer athin scotland as a result o thair accumulatit wealth
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the faimily's oreeginal seat wis douglas castle in lanrikshire but thay spread tae mony properties throughoot scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare ar mony members o the douglas clan buried throughoot the warld sic as the abbey o saint germain des pres in paris an at melrose abbey
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: perhaps maist notable o aw is at st bride's kirk in douglas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: dedicatit tae st bride the patron saunt o the douglas it haulds the mausolea o mony distinguished douglases includin that o the good sir james douglas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: accordin tae tradeetion the douglases teuk thair name frae the gaelic placename dubh glas meanin black blue/green stream
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ane auld tradeetion is that the first chief o clan douglas wis sholto douglas who helped the keeng o scotland win a battle in the year 767
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this is unsubstantiatit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the true progenitor o clan douglas wis amsist certainly theobaldus flammatius theobald the flemming who received in 1147 the lands near douglas water in lanrikshire in return for services for the abbot o kelso
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho the douglases wur first recordit in the 1170s the douglas faimily names consistit o arkenbald an freskin an wur undoubtedly relatit tae the clan murray an tae be o flemish oreegin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the clan murray wur descendit frae a flemish knight cawed freskin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tho the flemish oreegin o the douglases is no undisputit it is aften claimed that the douglases wur descendit frae a flemish knight who wis grantit lands on the douglas water bi the abbot o kelso who held the barony an lordship o holydean
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: housomeivver this is disputie it haes been claimed that the lands which wur grantit tae this knight wur no the lands which the douglas faimily came frae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1179 william douglas wis lord o douglas an it seems likely that he wis theobald the flemming's son an the first tae tak the surname douglas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin the wars o scots unthirldom sir william douglas the hardy lord o douglas wis govrenor o berwick upon tweed when the toun an berwick castle wur besieged bi the forces o edward i o ingland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: douglas wis captured an wis released ae efter he haed agreed tae accept the claim o the inglis keeng tae be owerlord o scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he subsequently jynt william wallace in feghtin for scots unthirldom but wis captured an taken tae ingland whaur he dee'd in 1298 a preesoner in the touer o lunnon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: william le hardi's son james douglas the good sir james wis the first tae tak the epithet black
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: douglas wis set tae share in bruce's early misfortunes bein present at the defeats at methven an dalrigh
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: but for baith men thir setbacks wur tae provide a valuable lesson in tactics limitations in baith resoorces an equipment meant that the scots wad aye be at a disadvantage in conventional medieval warfare
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bi the time the war wis renewed in the ware o 1307 thay haed learnt the value o guerrilla warfare - kent at the time as secret war - uisin fast movin lichtly equipped an agile forces tae maximum effect against an enemy aften locked in tae static defensive poseetions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sir james douglas recaptured roxburgh castle frae the inglis in 1313
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sir james douglas wis made a knight banneret a heich honour on the field an commandit a wing o the airmy at the battle o bannockburn in 1314
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: james wis cried the black douglas bi the inglis for his daurk deeds in inglis een becomin the bogeyman o a northren inglis lullaby hush ye hush ye little pet ye
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hush ye hush ye do no fret ye
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the black douglas shall no get ye thare ar an aa unsubstantiated theories that this wis acause o his colourin an complexion this is tenuous douglas ae appears in inglis record as the black in scots chronicles he is amaist aye referred tae as the guid or the good
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: later douglas lords teuk the moniker o thair revered forebear in the same wey that thay attached bruce's hert tae thair coat o airms tae strike fear intae the hearts o thair enemies an exhibit the prowess o thair race
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: keeng robert the bruce haed requestit that douglas latterly his maist esteemed companion in arms should cairy his hert tae the holy land as atonement for the murder o john iii comyn
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: douglas an his knights haed been invitit tae jyne the forces o alfonso xi o castile edward iii o ingland's cousin bi his mither queen isabella tae fecht against the moors in 1330 at the siege o teba
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: douglas wis killed as he led a cavalry charge against the enemy while outnumbered an cut off frae the main christian force alfonso kept his airmy back frae the attack likely in some arrangement wi his cousin edward who coud niver beat the douglas in combat
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the casket containin the hert o the bruce wis recovered an returned tae scotland tae be interred at melrose abbey
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: douglas bones wur boiled an returned tae scotland his embalmed hert wis recently recovered in the douglas vaults at the kirk o st bride but his bones ar no in the stane vault lyin unner his effigy an thay hae yet tae be locatit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the scots airmy that focht an lost the battle o halidon hill in 1333 wis led bi james yungest brither who haed been electit regent o scotland in late mairch o 1333
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sir archibald douglas haes been badly treatit bi some historians frequently misidentifyin this douglas warrior as the tyneman or loser when the moniker wis intendit for a later less fortunate but equally warlike archibald
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis mentioned in barbour's the brus for his great victory durin the weardale campaign leadin the scots airmy further sooth intae coonty durham he devastatit the lands an teuk muckle booty frae darlington an ither nearby touns an veelages
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sir james the good douglas naitural son william succeedit tae the title as lord o douglas but mey no hae completit his title tae the estates possibly acause he might hae been unnerage
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he dee'd at battle o halidon hill wi his uncle sir archibald douglas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: james younger brither hugh the dull lord o douglas a canon servin the see o glasgae an held a prebendary at roxburgh became lord douglas in 1342 hugh o douglas resigned his title tae his nephew the yungest survivin son o the regent archibald william lord o douglas who wis tae acome the first earl
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the first earl's legitimate son james douglas 2nt earl o douglas succeedit him
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his illegitimate son bi margaret stewart 4t coontess o angus wis george douglas 1st earl o angus who wis the progenitor o the earls o angus an aa kent as the red douglases
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the prestige o the faimily wis greatly increased when james douglas's great nephew james douglas 2nt earl o douglas mairit a house o stuart princess
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1388 at the battle o otterburn he wis instrumental tae the scots victory but wis killed durin the feghtin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: leavin nae legitimate heir his titles passed tae the illegitimate son o his great uncle
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: archibald douglas 3rd earl o douglas did muckle tae consolidate the faimily's pouer an influence
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he successfully defendit edinburgh castle against henry iv o ingland in 1400 but dee'd the follaein year
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his son archibald douglas 4t earl o douglas marriet the dochter o robert iii o scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the fowert earl focht against keeng henry iv o ingland at the battle o shrewsbury in 1403 whaur he wis taken preesoner
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he became a general in joan o arc's airmy an continued the fecht against the inglis
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis rewardit for his efforts wi the duchy o touraine
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1406 wi the daith o the keeng the 4t earl o douglas became ane o the cooncil o regents tae rule scotland durin the childhood o james i o scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1412 the 4t earl haed visitit paris when he entered intae a personal alliance wi john the fearless duke o burgundy an in 1423 he commandit a contingent f 10000 scots sent tae the aid o charles vii o fraunce against the inglis
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis made lieutenant general in the french airmy an received the title duke o touraine wi remainder tae his heirs male on 19 aprile 1424
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the newly creatit french duke wis defeatit an slain at battle o verneuil on 17 august 1424 alang wi his seicont son james an son in law john stewart 2nt earl o buchan
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the douglases became sae pouerful that bi the early fifteent century thay wur seen as a threat tae the stability o the naition
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1440 the young william douglas 6t earl o douglas an his brither wur invitit tae dine wi the ten year auld keeng james ii o scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the dinner wis organised bi sir william crichton o clan crichton
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: kent as the black bull dinner a black bull's heid the seembol o daith wis brought in
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter the dinner the douglas chiefs wur dragged oot tae castle hill gien a mock trial an beheadit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the clan douglas then laid siege tae edinburgh castle
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: crichton perceivin the danger surrendered the castle tae the keeng an wis raised tae the title o lord crichton
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is still unclear exactly who else wis ultimately responsible tho it is thocht crichton livingstone an buchan as likely candidates
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1448 hugh douglas earl o ormond held command alang wi john wallace o clan wallace when he led a scots force tae victory against an inglis airmy at the battle o sark in 1448
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the keeng gae the earl o atholl's confiscatit lands o strathbogie tae clan gordon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the castle thare became kent as huntly a reminder o the gordons berwickshire lands
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sir alexander gordon wis creatit earl o huntly in 1449
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at this time the keeng wis at enmity wi the pouerful clan douglas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the gordons stood on the keeng's side an wi thair men involved in the sooth o the kintra
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the earl o moray wis a relation an ally o the douglases
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he an the douglases teuk the opportunity tae sack the gordon lands settin huntly castle ablaze
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: housomeivver the gordons returned an quickly destroyed thair enemies
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho the castle wis burned tae the grund a grander castle wis biggit in its place
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the douglases haed a lang feud wi clan colville
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sir richard colville haed killed the laird o auchinleck who wis an ally o the douglases
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tae avenge this murther the douglases attacked the colvilles in thair castle whaur mony wur killed
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the douglases levelled the colville's castle an put thair men tae the sword
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: william douglas 8t earl o douglas personally executit richard colville
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the strength o the douglases made it impossible for james ii o scotland tae rule freely
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter fruitless feudin wi the douglases the keeng invitit william douglas 8t earl o douglas tae stirling castle in 1452 unner the promise o safe conduct but then the keeng accused the earl o conspiracy in his dealings wi the yorkists in ingland an throu a pact made atween douglas the earl o crawford an the lord o the isles
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: upon douglas refusal tae repudiate the pact an reaffirm his loyalty tae james ii the keeng drew his dagger an stabbed douglas in the throat
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the story goes that the keeng's captain o the guard then finished off the earl wi a pole axe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the body wis thrown frae the windae intae a gairden belaw whaur it wis later gien burial
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a stained gless windae bearin the douglas arms nou owerluiks douglas garden the spot whaur the earl is said tae hae fallen
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1455 james douglas 9t earl o douglas rebelled against the keeng but his forces wur defeatit at the battle o arkinholm bi the keeng's forces who wur commandit bi the reid douglas earl o angus
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this brought an end tae the black douglases
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter the battle an act o parliament gae the earl o angus the lordship o douglas wi the oreeginal possessions o his ancestors in douglasdale
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the 9t earl wis later defeatit bi the forces o keeng james iii o scotland at the battle o lochmaben fair in 1484
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1513 thare wis a strang douglas contingent at the battle o flodden field whaur twa o archibald douglas 5th earl o angus's red douglas's sons wur killed alang wi 200 men o the clan douglas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a dispute occurred in 1530 when sir robert charteris the 8t laird an chief o clan charteris focht a duel wi sir james douglas o drumlanrig in what wis said tae hae been ane o the last great chivalric contests
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis focht wi aw the observance o a medieval tournament wi heralds an the keeng himsel watchin frae the castle walls
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the joust wis apparently focht wi sic fury that charteris swurd wis brakken an the keeng haed tae send his men at arms tae pairt the combatants
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: archibald douglas 6t earl o angus held the post o lord chancellor an became guardian o james v o scotland bi marryin his widowed mither margaret tudor wi whom he haed a dochter margaret douglas mither o henry stuart lord darnley
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1545 angus led his forces tae victory at the battle o ancrum moor whaur thay defeatit the inglis airmy durin the rough wooing an he wis an aa present at the defeat in 1547 at the battle o pinkie cleugh
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: james douglas 4t earl o morton nephew o the 6t earl o angus wis a bitter enemy o mary queen o scots
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis ane o the murderers o the queen's secretary david rizzio an wis hivily implicatit in the murther o her seicont husband lord darnley
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as regent he wis brutal in crushin factions still lyal tae mary housomeivver he wis accused o complicity in the murther o darnley an wis executit in 1581
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin the wars o the three kinricks william douglas 11t earl o angus a catholic wis a supporter o charles i o scotland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1633 he wis creatit marquess o douglas
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: followin the battle o kilsyth in 1645 he jynt james graham 1st marquess o montrose an wis present when royalist forces focht covenanter cavalry at the battle o philiphaugh whaur he barely escaped wi his life
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein cromwell's victory he wis able tae mak peace an wis fined £1000
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1660 william douglas the brither o the seicont marquess o douglas became throu marriage the duke o hamilton
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: eventually the titles o marquess o douglas earl o angus an several others devolved tae the dukes o hamilton an the heir o that hoose is aaways styled marquess o douglas an clydesdale
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the douglas an hamilton lines became douglas hamilton an unner scots law ar barred frae inheritin the title o chief o clan douglas due tae the hyphenatit surname
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this similarly applies tae the douglas home faimily who jynt thair surnames in the aichteent century
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1689 james douglas earl o angus raised the cameronian regiment earl o angus's regiment awtho greatly outnumbered the regiment managed tae defeat a lairger jacobite force at the battle o dunkeld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the regiment wis victorious unner the command o captain george munro o auchinbowie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1703 the marquisate o douglas wis elevatit tae a dukedom housomeivver in the late 17t century mair politeecal pouer wis wieldit bi the douglases o drumlanrig in dumfriesshire who ar an aa descendit frae the black douglases
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the douglases o drumlanrig haed acome earl o queensberry in 1633 marquises in 1682 an dukes in 1684
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the manoeuvres o james douglas 2nt duke o queensberry contributit tae the union o 1707
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: later in the 18t century durin the jacobite uprisings the douglases continued thair support for the breetish govrenment
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the duke o douglas led the volunteer horse durin the battle o sheriffmuir in 1715
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: an aa at that fecht wis the duke's young cousin archibald douglas 2nt earl o forfar colonel o the 3rd regiment o fit an who dee'd o wounds taken thare shortly efterwards
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: douglas castle wis burnt bi the hieland armies o bonnie prince charlie in the 1745 uprisin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: douglas castle wis again burnt doun in 1755 an the duke commenced wirk on a new edifice designed bi robert adam
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: biggin wirk ceased on the duke's daith in 1761 an wi it his dukedom became extinct
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the marquisate o douglas an earldom o angus devolved tae james hamilton 7t duke o hamilton the senior male line descendant o the 2nt marquis o douglas his great great great grandfaither
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this is a leet o extinct leids redd bi thair time o extinction
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: when the exact time o daith o the last remainin speaker o it is nae kent aither an approximate time or the date when the leid wis last bein recordit is gien
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: naetheless the leet is nae hail
lines.name: Scots
